maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.cpp

#include "beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastmeshwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastcamerawrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastlightwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastshaderwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttexturewrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

BeastInstancePtr BeastScene::createInstance( BeastMesh& mesh, ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m )
{
        ILBInstanceHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateInstance(obj(), mesh.obj(), name, &m, &h));
        BeastInstancePtr instance = BeastInstancePtr(new BeastInstance(h));
        return instance;
}

BeastCameraPtr BeastScene::createPerspectiveCamera( ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m )
{
        ILBCameraHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreatePerspectiveCamera(obj(), name, &m, &h));
        return BeastCameraPtr(new BeastCamera(h));
}

BeastMaterialPtr BeastScene::createMaterial( ILBConstString name )
{
        ILBMaterialHandle h;
        ILBStatus res = ILBCreateMaterial(obj(), name, &h);
        if (res == ILB_ST_SUCCESS) {
                return BeastMaterialPtr(new BeastMaterial(h));
        } else if (ILB_ST_INVALID_OBJECT_STATE) {
                return BeastMaterialPtr();
        }
        BEAST_CALL(res);
        return BeastMaterialPtr();
}

BeastMaterialPtr BeastScene::findMaterial( ILBConstString name )
{
        ILBMaterialHandle h;
        ILBStatus res = ILBFindMaterial(obj(), name, &h);
        if(res == ILB_ST_SUCCESS) {
                // NOTE: WE CREATE A DUPLICATE SHARED POINTER HERE
                // NO BIGGIE FOR NOW SINCE WE DON'T REMOVE OBJECTS
                // BUT WHEN WE DO WE NEED TO TRACK THIS
                return BeastMaterialPtr(new BeastMaterial(h));
        } else if(res == ILB_ST_UNKNOWN_OBJECT) {
                return BeastMaterialPtr();
        }
        BEAST_CALL(res);
        return BeastMaterialPtr();
}

BeastLightPtr BeastScene::createPointLight( ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m, const ILBLinearRGB& intensity )
{
        ILBLightHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreatePointLight(obj(), name, &m, &intensity, &h));
        BeastLightPtr res(new BeastLight(h));
        return res;
}

BeastLightPtr BeastScene::createDirectionalLight( ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m, const ILBLinearRGB& intensity )
{
        ILBLightHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateDirectionalLight(obj(), name, &m, &intensity, &h));
        BeastLightPtr res(new BeastLight(h));
        return res;
}

BeastLightPtr BeastScene::createSpotLight( ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m, const ILBLinearRGB& intensity )
{
        ILBLightHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateSpotLight(obj(), name, &m, &intensity, &h));
        BeastLightPtr res(new BeastLight(h));
        return res;
}

BeastLightPtr BeastScene::createAreaLight( ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m, const ILBLinearRGB& intensity )
{
        ILBLightHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateAreaLight(obj(), name, &m, &intensity, &h));
        BeastLightPtr res(new BeastLight(h));
        return res;
}

BeastLightPtr BeastScene::createSkyLight( ILBConstString name, const ILBMatrix4x4& m, const ILBLinearRGB& intensity)
{
        ILBLightHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateSkyLight(obj(), name, &m, &intensity, &h));
        BeastLightPtr res(new BeastLight(h));
        return res;
}

void BeastScene::end()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBEndScene(obj()));
}

void BeastScene::setMeterPerWorldUnit( float meterPerWorldUnit )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetMeterPerWorldUnit(obj(), meterPerWorldUnit));
}

}
